keyMoments.title: Ice Time Technique Revealed
keyMoments.description: Aokiji uses his signature Ice Time technique to instantly freeze Luffy solid with a single touch, demonstrating the devastating power of the Hie Hie no Mi.
keyMoments.significance: First full demonstration of Ice Time on a major character, showing the fruit's ability to freeze opponents in suspended animation.

abilities.description: The user touches an opponent and instantly freezes them solid, placing them in suspended animation. Victims become extremely fragile and can shatter if struck. Requires careful, slow thawing to survive.
As a Logia user, Aokiji can transform into ice, allowing him to break apart and reform his body to avoid attacks.

reveals.information: Ice Time can freeze opponents instantly on contact, placing them in life-threatening suspended animation

limitations.limitation: Ice can be melted by extreme heat or fire-based abilities

keyMoments.title: Gomu Gomu no Storm Used Against Admiral
keyMoments.description: Luffy uses his Gomu Gomu no Storm technique against Admiral Aokiji, but it proves ineffective against the Logia user.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the limitations of Luffy's current abilities against Logia-type Devil Fruit users.

abilities.description: Luffy stretches both arms far back and unleashes a massive barrage of rapid-fire punches at his opponent. One of his most powerful techniques at this point in the series.

reveals.information: Physical attacks from the Gomu Gomu no Mi are ineffective against Logia users who can disperse their bodies

limitations.limitation: Cannot hit Logia users without Haki or exploiting their elemental weakness
